All your files in one secure location, accessible anywhere

Fylo stores all your most important files in one secure location.
Access them wherever you need, share and collaborate with friends, family and co-workers.

Access your files, anywhere
The ability to use smartphone, tablet or computer to access your account means your files follow you anywhere
Security you can trust
2-factor aunthentication and user-controlled encryption are just a couple of the security features we allow to secure your files.
Real-time collaboration
Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachment required.
Store any type of file
Whether you're sharing holiday photos or work documents, Fylo has you covered allowing for all file types to be securely stored and shared.

Stay productive,
wherever you are

Never let location be an issue when accessing your files. Fylo has you covered for all of your file storage needs.

Security share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required.
